channel.title: Knight Online
channel.description: Hi, I play a mmorpg called Knight Online and i have tried to get scar to run with it but it will not press the keys that i set it to press. I have tried using all the sendkeys commands and the keydown commands yet it still does not work. I was wondering if anyone could help me with this.

item.title: Knight Online
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

item.title: Knight Online
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

[quote=“KyleGut3, post:4, topic:17569”]Basically, Knight Online has an anti-hack system in that restricts any program from getting pixels or controlling the mouse/keyboard etc…

As to your need for ‘h4x’ - http://www.fgnetwork.net/forums/index.php?act=idx - is the “Fuck Gaming Network”.[/quote]

is it safe?

Read full topic
